channel.title: Testscape?
channel.description: hi i am having difficulty figuring out how to change the experince per hit in testscape can somebody please help me?

item.title: Testscape?
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Well, replace them with these then

case 823:
if (actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage("!");
setAnimation(0x485);
addItem(995,100000);
addSkillXP((*playerLevel[0]), 0);
addSkillXP((*playerLevel[3]), 3);
addSkillXP((*playerLevel[18]), 18);
actionTimer = 14;
}
break;

Add in your own exp rate (addSkillXP) make them all the same

case 299:
if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
if(actionTimer == 0)
{
sendMessage("");
addSkillXP((*playerLevel[1]), 1);
addSkillXP((*playerLevel[18]), 18);
actionTimer = 12;
setAnimation(0x555);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
break;

Go ahead and make your own message, add your skill XP

case 1531:
if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
if(actionTimer == 0)
{
sendMessage("");
actionTimer = 12;
setAnimation(0x326);
addItem(4152,5);
addSkillXP((*playerLevel[2]), 2);
addSkillXP((*playerLevel[3]), 3);
addSkillXP((*playerLevel[18]), 18);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
break;

Add in your message and skillXP

Read full topic

item.title: Testscape?
item.dc:creator: @death4u4222 death4u4222
item.description:
@death4u4222 wrote:

it says what the dummy is and what happens when u hit it but it doesent tell you how much expirience is gained

Read full topic

item.title: Testscape?
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

On the doors bales and dummys, look for the cases, here I’ll help
Dummys:Case 823 (search for it, and change the experience rate)
Doors:Case 1531 (do as you did to dummys)
Bales:Case 299 (do as you did to dummys)
Range:Search for “target” or something like that, and change it.
Mage: I recommend finding the case # for varrock tele, and just change mage exp with that.

Read full topic
